title: Divya Jyothi Diamond Haaram with Ruby Accents and Pearl Drops
materials: Natural South Sea Pearls. The gold is finished with a traditional Hyderabadi polish for a lasting luster.
features: This exquisite haaram features a delicate floral and paisley design meticulously crafted with pav√©-set diamonds. The central pendant showcases a larger ruby cabochon surrounded by intricate diamond detailing, echoing the floral motifs of the necklace. The addition of lustrous South Sea pearl drops adds a touch of classic elegance. The design draws inspiration from traditional South Indian jewellery but with a modern, lighter feel.
colors: Primarily gold and white from the diamonds
accented by the vibrant red of the rubies and the creamy white of the pearls.
occasions: and other special occasions. Its elegant design also makes it suitable for upscale parties and cultural events.
description: This haaram is a stunning blend of traditional South Indian aesthetics and contemporary design. The high-quality diamonds sparkle brilliantly, and the ruby accents add a pop of color. The use of South Sea pearls elevates the piece, making it a timeless heirloom. The craftsmanship is impeccable, ensuring durability and lasting beauty.
